item.title: Flytipping has been removed from Hayles St. & Lamlash Garden but the area now needs litter picking and sweeping., 1st January
item.description:
This actually applies to all of Hayles St, Lamlash St, Elliotts Row and Brook Drive. The whole area needs a good sweep. It will take a team not just one person. It would be good to start 2026 with a clean sweep üòä

item.title: NOS Cylinders and Street Friends Project, 1st January
item.description:
Hi, A Street Friends Project was carried out in this area. Please collect NOS Cylinders and other various items including paint tin, Tyre Fence Panel, various bags( some are veolia) some are others that were come across during the project and some were standard black bags that were used as needed to be conservative with the veolia ones. This is all located by the fence panels near the corner on the left side as you are going to Kevington. ( Please note I have tried to upload pictures of the items, but am unable to at the moment?? As soon as I can I will add these, thought it more important to bring it to your attention. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waldens Road, St Mary Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Influx of graffiti outside 25 Morant house. The graffiti is very visible both along the street on the bixes and the electric car charger point., 1st January
item.description:
I like to report an influx of graffiti along Stockwell Road SW9 OTZ. The graffiti is most visible on the street boxes and electric vehicle charging point. Also its been sprayed on the lower section of walls and entrances leading into residential flats. Please can the graffiti be removed. It has been up for approximately one month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Road, Stockwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
